itemListElement.name: Spaghetti Squash Pasta with Sun-dried Tomato, Garlic & Basil

@graph.name: Spaghetti Squash Pasta with Sun-dried Tomato, Garlic and Basil
@graph.description: Spaghetti Squash Pasta with Sun-dried Tomato, Garlic & Basil. Light Dinner with no Grains. Add some spiced chickpeas, roasted nuts or baked tofu for variation. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 3  small spaghetti squashes or 1 large or 3 cups cooked
2 tbsp fresh basil (plus more for garnish)
2 tbsp or more vegan parmesan  (to taste for garnish or a crumble up my almond cheese ball)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Pierce the spaghetti squash a couple of times. Then place on a baking sheet and bake for 45 minutes.  (40 mins for smaller, 50 mins for larger). Check if a knife goes through easily. Remove from the oven and cool for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Pierce the spaghetti squash a couple of times. Then place on a baking sheet and bake for 45 minutes.  (40 mins for smaller, 50 mins for larger). Check if a knife goes through easily. Remove from the oven and cool for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the squash, then scoop out the seeds. Use a fork to make shreds. Scoop out the shreds in a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the squash, then scoop out the seeds. Use a fork to make shreds. Scoop out the shreds in a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes until lightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes until lightly golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add basil, parsley and sundried tomato and cook for a minute. Add a few tbsp of water and mix in. Bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add basil, parsley and sundried tomato and cook for a minute. Add a few tbsp of water and mix in. Bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spaghetti squash, sprinkle salt, pepper and lightly toss. Serve garnished with pepper flakes, vegan parm or crumble up my 10 minute almond cheese ball and fresh basil. Store in the refrigerator for upto 3 days
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spaghetti squash, sprinkle salt, pepper and lightly toss. Serve garnished with pepper flakes, vegan parm or crumble up my 10 minute almond cheese ball and fresh basil. Store in the refrigerator for upto 3 days
